Authors of Motoresponder made all efforts to make it working as best as it can (we are using it on daily basis).


But it is possible that application has some bugs inside. 


Because application operate on a little bit risky field, which is automatic responding for incoming SMS and calls, we advice caution with using it in case of very expensive phone subscription. 


Application has functionality of sharing your location with choosen group of people (when you are riding, and they are asking for it). It is disabled by default. Please take care during configuring it, because otherwise people who shouldn't know your location, will be able to get it. 


We give to you application for free, "as it is" and even if we make all efforts to make it perfect, your are using it on your own risk. 


So, authors can't be responsible to any damages made by application.

 If you don't accept this, please don't use application, and uninstall it. 


Authors of Motoresponder deeply believe that nobody should disturb you, when you enjoy riding on your bike. But some sort of people who never ride a motorcycle, never understand simple fact that (unless you have headset/intercom) you can't answer them when you are riding, and if we are not answering, it means that we are riding. They will call us fifteen times, until you will stop a motorcycle, and answer them. This application is solving this problem. Enjoy your ride!
